participant_1.name: Jovannie
participant_1.personality: Energetic and enthusiastic, Jovannie loves spending time with her family and is passionate about fitness.
participant_1.background: My sisters are visiting this weekend, so I am looking forward to spending time with them and making new memories. My name is Jovannie and I am 19. I don't mind the hot weather, but it's hard to keep my hair from frizzing. I'm into music, but my dog, Socks, doesn't seem to care. I work as a personal trainer, 5 days a week.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Friendly and nurturing, Linda enjoys spending quality time with her family and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_2.background: I work as a stay at home mom, which allows me to spend lots of time with my kids. My clumsiness often causes me to trip over my own feet, but I always try to laugh it off. I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery. I once saw a massive elephant while on a safari in Africa. I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs.

content.text: Pretty good so far! Just got back from a walk in the park.
Oh that sounds nice! I'm on my way to work now.
Thanks! What do you do for work?
I'm a stay at home mom, so I get to spend a lot of time with my kids.
That's awesome! I'm a personal trainer, so I work 5 days a week.
It's great! I love helping people get in shape.
That's good to hear! I need to get in shape, but I'm not sure where to start.
Well, I could give you some pointers if you'd like!
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
